SA11bsa047_u:286: tathā hi na tāvat samānakālaṃ kāraṇaṃ svabhāvavat kāryasyāpi tatsamānakālabhāvitayā niṣpannatvāt /
SA11bsa047_u:288: avyavadhānenāpyutpāde sarvātmānā yadyavyavadhāṇaṃ tadaikasminneva kṣaṇe sarvakṣaṇānām anupraveśāt kalpasya kṣaṇamātratāprasaṅgaḥ /
SA11bsa047_u:291: svato 'pi notpadyante, nirhetukapakṣeṇaivāsya pakṣasya saṅgṛhītatvāt svātmani ca kāritravirodhāt /
SA11bsa047_u:297: bhāvā vidyanti saṃvṛtyā paramārthe na bhāvakāḥ /
SA11bsa047_u:299: iyaṃ ca yuktirbhagavato 'bhipretā śālistambādau / svataḥ parata ubhābhyām ahetośca janmaniṣedhāt /
SA11bsa047_u:302: tatrāpi tāvad rūpiṇo ghatādayaste 'ṇuśo vibhinnarūpatvād naikasvabhāvāḥ /
SA11bsa047_u:303: aṇūnāṃ pūrvāparasthitānāṃ pūrvādidigbhāgatvena vibhidyamānānām asiddhāvapyaṇusaṃcayātmakatve nānekasvabhāvo yuktaḥ,
SA11bsa047_u:304: na caikānekasvabhāvavyatirekeṇāparaḥ kaścid bhāvasvabhāvo 'stīti niḥsvabhāvā evāmī paramārthataḥ svapnādyupalabdharūpādivad rūpiṇo bhavāḥ /
SA11bsa047_u:308: ye cārupiṇaste 'pi tathaiva vicāryumāṇā niḥsvabhāvā eva /
SA11bsa047_u:310: bāhyasya nīlāderarthasyābhāvāt sāmarthyata eva vijñānādayo 'rūpiṇaḥ skandhā nilādirūpeṇa pratibhāsanta ityabhyupeyam /
SA11bsa047_u:312: "bahirdhā nāsti vairūpaṃ svacittaṃ dṛśyate bahiḥ /" iti /
SA11bsa047_u:313: tataśca nīlādicitrākāranirbhāsatayā grāhyagrāhakākāranirbhāsatayā naikasvabhāvā [Bhk_180] amī yuktāḥ /
SA11bsa047_u:316: athavā tatrālīkā evāmī rūpādaya ākārāḥ pratibhāsanta ityubyupagamyate,
SA11bsa047_u:319: na hi svayaṃ prakāśamānarūpatāvyatirekeṇānyad vijñānasya rūpamasti /
SA11bsa047_u:321: teṣāṃ ca vijñānasvarūpāpannānām alīkatve sarvameva vijñānam alīkam abhyupetaṃ syāt /
SA11bsa047_u:323: tasmād ekānekasvabhāvaśūnyatvena paramārthato 'līkā evāmī sarvabhāvā iti niścitametat /
SA11bsa047_u:326: dṛśyate na ca tatrāsti tathā bhāveṣu bhavatā // iti /
SA11bsa047_u:330: tadevaṃ cintāmayyā prajñayā niścitya bhūtamartha tasya pratyakṣīkaraṇāya bhāvanāmayīṃ prajñām utpādayet /
SA11bsa047_u:332: anubhavaśca pratipattṛṇām, na cāpi sphuṭatarajñānālokodayam antareṇa samyagāvaraṇatamo 'pahīyate /
SA11bsa047_u:335: tathā ca bhāvanāyāḥ parisphuṭajñānaphalatvena sāphalyamuktam āryasamādhirāje-
SA11bsa047_u:336: ārocayāmi prativedayāmi vo yathā yathā bahu ca vitarkayennaraḥ /
SA11bsa047_u:337: tathā tathā bhavati tannimittacittastehi vitarkehi tanniśritehi // iti vistaraḥ /
SA11bsa047_u:339: tatra prathamataraṃ tāvad yoginā śamatho niṣpādanīyaścittasthirīkaraṇāya /
SA11bsa047_u:341: na cāsamāhitena cetasā yathābhutaṃ śakyate jñātum /
SA11bsa047_u:342: uktaṃ hi bhagavatā- "samāhitacitto yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti" iti /
SA11bsa047_u:343: śamatho lābhādikāmanānirapekṣasya samyakpravṛttau sthirasya duḥkhādyadhivāsanaśilasyārabdhavīryasya śīghrataraṃ sampadyate /
SA11bsa047_u:344: ata eva āryasaṃdhinirvocanādau dānādaya uttarottaratvena varṇitāḥ /
SA11bsa047_u:345_1: praṇāmādikaṃ kṛtvā pāpadeśanāṃ puṇyānumodanāṃ vidhāya sakalajagadabhyuddharaṇāśayo
SA11bsa047_u:345_2: mahākaruṇām evābhimukhīkṛtya kāyam ṛjuṃ praṇidhāya sukhāsanopaviṣṭaḥ paryaṅkamābhujya
SA11bsa047_u:346: tatra prathamaṃ tāvad yad vastu vicārayitavyaṃ yāvatā prakāreṇa saṅkṣepataḥ sakalavastusaṅgraho bhavati tatra cittaṃ badhnīyat /
SA11bsa047_u:348: etaccādikarmikasya vikṣepadoṣaparihārārtha saṃkṣiptaṃ tāvad yuktam ālambayitum /
SA11bsa047_u:349: yadā tu jitamanaskāro bhavati tadā skandhadhātvādibhedena viśodhya vistaraśo 'pyālambata eva /
SA11bsa047_u:350: tathā sandhinirmocanādau yoginām aṣṭādaśaprakāraśūnyatālambanādibhedena nānāprakāram ālambanam uktam /
SA11bsa047_u:351: atraiva bhagavatā sattvānugrahād rūpyarūpyādibhedena saṃkṣepamadhyavistāraiḥ vastubhedo 'bhidharmādau nirdiṣṭaḥ /
SA11bsa047_u:353: tato niścitya sarvaṃ vastusaṅgrahaṃ tatraiva punaścittaṃ prabandhena prerayet /
SA11bsa047_u:354: yada tvantarā rāgādinā cittaṃ bahirvikṣipet tadāvagamya vikṣepatām aśubhādibhāvanayā vikṣepam upaśāmya punastatraivoparyupari cittaṃ prerayet /
SA11bsa047_u:356: yadā tu cittaṃ tatrānabhirataṃ paśyet, tada samādherguṇadarśanato 'bhiratiṃ tatra bhāvayet /
SA11bsa047_u:358_0: atha yadā styānamiddhābhibhavād āalambanagrahaṇāprakaṭatayālīnaṃ cittaṃ bhavati tadā
SA11bsa047_u:359: atha yadā pūrvahasitaramitādyanusmarato 'ntarā cittam uddhataṃ paśyet,
SA11bsa047_u:362: atha yadā layauddhatyabhyāṃ viviktatayā samapravṛttaṃ svarasavāhicittaṃ paśyet tadābhogaśithīlīkaraṇād [Bhk_183] upekṣate /
SA11bsa047_u:363: yadā tu samapravṛtte satyābhogaḥ kriyate, tadā cittaṃ vikṣipet /
SA11bsa047_u:364: yadā tu tatrālambane 'nabhisaṃskāravāhi yāvadicchaṃ cittaṃ pravṛttaṃ bhavati,
SA11bsa047_u:369: ayaṃ ca śamathamārgo bhagavatā āryaprajñāpāramitādau nirdiṣṭaḥ /
SA11bsa047_u:382: upasthāpayati, vikṣepaṃ parihṛtya uparyupari punastatraivālambane sthāpayati /
SA11bsa047_u:388: eṣa caiṣāṃ padānām arthaḥ pūrvācāryaiḥ maitreyeṇa ca vyākhyātaḥ /
SA11bsa047_u:389: saṃkṣepeṇa sarvasaiva samādheḥ ṣaḍ doṣā bhavanti /
SA11bsa047_u:392: tad yathā- śraddhā, chandaḥ, vyāyāmaḥ praśrabdhiḥ, smṛtiḥ, samprajanyam, cetanā, upekṣā ceti /
SA11bsa047_u:394: tathā hi- samādherguṇeṣvabhisampratyayalakṣaṇayā śraddhayā tatra yogino 'bhilāṣa utpadyate /
SA11bsa047_u:402: layauddhatyāpraśamanakāle tvanābhogadoṣaḥ tatpratipakṣeṇa ca cetanā bhāvanīyā /
SA11bsa047_u:403: layauddhatyapraśame sati yadā cittaṃ praśamavāhi tadābhogadoṣaḥ,
SA11bsa047_u:405: ebhiraṣṭābhiḥ prahāṇasaṃskāraiḥ samanvāgataḥ samādhiḥ paramakarmaṇyo bhavati /
SA11bsa047_u:407: ata evoktaṃ sūtra- "[aṣṭa]prahāṇa [saṃskāra]samanvāgataḥ ṛddhipādaṃ bhāvayati" iti /
SA11bsa047_u:408: eṣā ca cittaikāgratā uttarottarakarmaṇyatāsamprayogād ālambanādiguṇaviśeṣayogācca dhyānārūpisamāpattiḥ vimokṣādivyapadeśaṃ labhate /
SA11bsa047_u:409: tathā hi yadopekṣāvedanāsamprayuktā savitarkasavicārā sā bhavati,
SA11bsa047_u:411: yadā ca kāmatṛṣṇayā pāpadharmaiśca] viviktā bhavati [vitarkavicāra]prītisukhādhyātmasamprasādaiḥ samprayuktā bhavati,
SA11bsa047_u:414: yadā vitarkavicārarahitā prathamadhyānabhūmitṛṣṇayā viviktā ca bhavati /
SA11bsa047_u:415: prītisukhādhyātmasamprasādaiḥ samprayuktā bhavati, tadā dvitīyaṃ dhyānamucyate /
SA11bsa047_u:420: aduḥkhāsukhā upekṣāsmṛtyabhisamprayuktā bhavati, tadā caturthaṃ dhyānamucyate /
SA11bsa047_u:425: anyathā hi tīrthikānāmiva samādhimātreṇa kleśaprahāṇaṃ na syāt / yathoktaṃ sutre-
SA11bsa047_u:426: kiñcāpi bhāvayet samādhimetaṃ na co bibhāveyya sā ātmasaṃjñām /
SA11bsa047_u:427: punaḥ prakupyati kileṣu tasya yathodrakasyeha samādhibhāvanā // iti /
SA11bsa047_u:434: jñānaṃ nirātmakaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ nirābhāse na paśyati // iti /
SA11bsa047_u:435: tatrāyamarthaḥ- prathamaṃ yogī ye rūpiṇo dharmā bāhyārthatayā paraiḥ parikalpitāsteṣu tāvad vicārayet /
SA11bsa047_u:436: kimete vijñānād anye, āhosvid vijñānamevaitat tathā pratibhāsate, yathā svapnāvasthāyāmiti /
SA11bsa047_u:438: paramāṇūṃśca bhāgaśaḥ pratyavekṣa- māṇo yogī tān arthānna samanupaśyati /
SA11bsa047_u:439: tasyāsamanupaśyata evaṃ bhavati cittamātramevaitat sarvaṃ na punarbāhyo 'rthā vipadyate / tadevam-
SA11bsa047_u:445: tatra yaccittamātraṃ tadapyasati grāhye grāhako na yukto grāhakasya grāhyapekṣatvad tataścittaṃ grāhyagrāhakaviviktam advayameva cittamiti vicārayed advayalakṣaṇe-
SA11bsa047_u:448: evaṃ cittamātramatikramya tadapi dvayanirābhasaṃ yajjñānaṃ tadatikrameta /
SA11bsa047_u:449: svataḥ parato bhāvānāṃ janmānupapatteḥ grāhyagrāhakayoścālīkatve tadavyatirekāt tasyāpi satyatvamayuktamiti vicārayet /
SA11bsa047_u:450: tatrāpyadvayajñāne vastutvābhiniveśaṃ tyajet, advayajñānanirābhāsa eva jñāne tiṣṭhedityarthaḥ /
SA11bsa047_u:453: tathā cādvayajñānanirābhāse jñāne yadā sthito yogī tadā paramatattve sthitatvāt,
SA11bsa047_u:455: etadeva tat mahāyānam ucyate yat paramatattvadarśanam /
SA11bsa047_u:456: etadeva tat paramatattvadarśanaṃ yat sarvadharmān prajñācakṣuṣā nirūpayataḥ samyagjñānāvaloke satyadarśanam /
SA11bsa047_u:457: tathā coktaṃ sutre- "katamaṃ paramārthadarśanam? sarvadharmāṇām adarśanam /" iti /
SA11bsa047_u:458: atredṛśamevādarśanamabhipretaṃ na tu nimīlitākṣajātyandhānāmiva pratyayavaikalyād amanasikārato vā yadadarśanam /
SA11bsa047_u:460: tato bhāvābhiniveśadiviparyāsavāsanāyā aprahīṇatvād asaṃjñisamāpattyādivyutthitasyeva punarapi bhāvābhiniveśamūlasya rāgādikleśagaṇasyotpatteramukta eva yogī bhavet /
SA11bsa047_u:463: tatrāpi prajñayā nirūpayato yo 'nupalambhaḥ sa tatrāmanasikāro 'bhipreto na manasikārābhāvamātram /
SA11bsa047_u:464: na hyasaṃjñisamāpattyādiriva anādikāliko rūpādyabhiniveśo manasikāraparivarjanamātrāt prahīyate /
SA11bsa047_u:465: saṃśayā prahāṇe tu na pūrvopalabdheṣu ca rūpādiṣvabhiniveśamanasikāraparivarjanaṃ śakyaṃ kartum agnyaparivarjane dāhāparivarjanavat /
SA11bsa047_u:466: tathāmī rūpādimithyāvikalpāḥ kaṇṭakādivadutkīlya na hastena cetaso 'panetavyāḥ /
SA11bsa047_u:468: tacca saṃśayabījaṃ yoginaḥ samādhyāloke sati prajñācakṣuṣā nirūpayatastesāṃ rūpādīnāṃ pūrvopalabdhānām upalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptānām anupalambhād,
SA11bsa047_u:471: tathā saṃśayabījāpagamād rūpādinimittamanasikāraḥ śakyate varjayituṃ nānyathā /
SA11bsa047_u:472: anyathā hyasati samādhyāloke prajñācakṣuṣāpyanavaloke yathā andhakūpāvasthitapuruṣasyāvacarakagataghāṭādiṣviva yogino rūpādiṣvastitvasaṃśayo naiva nivarteta /
SA11bsa047_u:473: tadanivṛttyā cā prahīṇatimiradoṣasyeva yo 'yukto 'līkarūpādyabhiniveśaḥ pravarteta na kenāpi nivartyeta /
SA11bsa047_u:474: tasmāt samādhihastena manaḥ sandhāya sūkṣmataraprajñāśastreṇa tatra cetasi rūpādimithyāvikalpabījam uddharet /
SA11bsa047_u:475: evam satyutkhātamūlā iva [Bhk_188] taravo bhūmernirmūlatayā mithyāvikalpāḥ punaścetasi na virohanti /
SA11bsa047_u:476: ata evāvaraṇaprahāṇāya śamathavipaśyanāyuganaddhavāhī mārgo bhagavatā nirdiṣṭaḥ,
SA11bsa047_u:478: śīlaṃ pratiṣṭhāya samādhilābhāḥ samādhilābhācca hi prajñābhāvanā /
SA11bsa047_u:479: prajñayā jñānaṃ bhavati viśuddhaṃ viśuddhajñānasya hi śīlasampat // iti /
SA11bsa047_u:480: tathā hi yadā śamathenālambane cittaṃ sthirīkṛtaṃ bhavati tadā prajñayā vicārayataḥ samyagjñānāloka utpadyate,
SA11bsa047_u:485: sa ca samāhito yathābhūtaṃ prajānātīti vacanādekāntena prajñānukūla eva bhavati,
SA11bsa047_u:486: na tu viruddhastasmāt syāt samāhitasya prajñayā nirūpayataḥ sarvadharmāṇāmanupalambhaḥ /
SA11bsa047_u:488: sā ca tādṛśī yogināmavasthānalakṣaṇā gatiranābhogā, tataḥ paraṃ dṛṣṭavyasyābhāvāt /
SA11bsa047_u:490: tathā hi yadā prajñayā nirūpayan na kiñcid bhāvasvabhāvam upalabhate yogī,
SA11bsa047_u:493: yadi bhāvaḥ kadācid dṛṣṭo bhavati, evaṃ sati tanniṣedhenābhāvavikalpaḥ pravartate /
SA11bsa047_u:494: yadā tu kālatraye 'pi bhāvo yoginā prajñācakṣuṣā nirūpayatā nopalabdhaḥ,
SA11bsa047_u:496: evamanye 'pi vikalpāstadā tasya na samutpadyanta eva bhāvābhāvavikalpābhyāṃ [Bhk_189] sarvavikalpasya vyāptatvāt /
SA11bsa047_u:499: tatra sthitasya yoginaḥ sarvavikalpānām astaṃgamāt samyak kleśāvaraṇaṃ jñeyāvaraṇaṃ ca prahīyate /
SA11bsa047_u:500: tathā hi kleśāvaraṇasyānutpannāniruddhabhāveṣu bhāvādiviparyāso mūlaṃ kāraṇam āryasatyadvayanirdeśādau varṇitaṃ bhagavatā /
SA11bsa047_u:501: anena ca yogābhyāsena sarvabhāvādivikalpānāṃ prahāṇāt sakalabhāvādiviparyāsasyāvidyāsvabhāvasya kleśāvaraṇamūlasya prahāṇam /
SA11bsa047_u:512: yaḥ punaḥ devaputra! paramārthato 'tyantājātānutpannābhāvān sarvadharmān prajānāti,
SA11bsa047_u:516: yaśca yoniśaḥ prayuktaḥ tasyātmasamāropo na bhavati /
SA11bsa047_u:517: yasyātmasamāropo na bhavati tasya dṛṣṭiparyutthānaṃ na bhavati /
SA11bsa047_u:518: yāvat paramārthato nirvāṇadṛṣṭisarva dṛṣṭiparyutthānam api na bhavati /
SA11bsa047_u:519: tasyaivam anutpādavihāriṇaḥ kleśā atyantaṃ vinītā draṣṭavyāḥ /
SA11bsa047_u:522: devaputra! kleśān nirābhāsena jñānena paramārthato 'tyantaśūnyān atyantābhāvān atyantanirnimittāt prajānāti,
SA11bsa047_u:524: tatra [Bhk_190] yathāpi nāma, devaputra! ya āśīviṣasya gotraṃ prajānāti /
SA11bsa047_u:526: evameva devaputra! ya kleśānāṃ gotraṃ prajānāti tasya kleśāḥ praśāmyanti /
SA11bsa047_u:527: devaputra āha- kataman mañjuśrīḥ! kleśānāṃ gotram /
SA11bsa047_u:528: āha- yāvad eṣā paramārthato 'tyantājātānutpannābhāveṣu sarvadharmeṣu kalpanā idaṃ kleśānāṃ gotram" iti vistaraḥ /
SA11bsa047_u:530: tatprahāṇe sakalaviparyāsaprahāṇād jñeyāvaraṇam apyanena samyak prahīyate,
SA11bsa047_u:532: jñeyāvaraṇe ca prahīṇe pratibandhābhāvād ravikiraṇavad apagatameghādyāvaraṇe nabhasi sarvatrāvyāhato yogi pratyakṣo jñānālokaḥ pravartate /
SA11bsa047_u:534: tacca saṃnihitam api vastu pratibandhasadbhāvānna prakāśayati /
SA11bsa047_u:535: pratibandhābhāve tu sati, acintyaśaktiviśeṣalābhāt kimiti sakalam eva vastu yathāvad na prakāśayet /
SA11bsa047_u:536: ataḥ saṃvṛtiparamārtharūpeṇa sakalasya vastuno yathāvat parijñānāt sarvajñatvam avāpyate /
SA11bsa047_u:537: ato 'yam evāvaraṇaprahāṇo sarvajñatvādhigame ca paramo mārgaḥ /
SA11bsa047_u:538: yastu śrāvakādīnāṃ mārgastena viparyāsāprahāṇān na samyag āvaraṇadvayaṃ prahīyate /
SA11bsa047_u:539: tathā coktam āryalaṅkāvatāre- "anye tu kāraṇādhīnān sarvadharmān dṛṣṭvānirvāṇe 'pi nirvāṇam iti buddhayo bhavanti /
SA11bsa047_u:542: atra mahāmate, [Bhk_191] kudṛṣṭivyāvartanā yogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ" iti /
SA11bsa047_u:543: ata eva cānyena mārgeṇa mokṣābhāvād ekam eva yānam uktaṃ bhagavatā /
SA11bsa047_u:546: na tvātmāstīti bhāvayan śrāvakaḥ pudgalanairātmyam avatarati,
SA11bsa047_u:551: uktaṃ ca āryalokottaraparivarte "punaraparaṃ bho jinaputra! cittamātraṃ traidhātukam avatarati,
SA11bsa047_u:555: sā ceyaṃ yoginām avasthā kuto viśodhitā? ityāha-
SA11bsa047_u:558: tataḥ praṇidhānabalād uttarottaradānādikuśalābhyāsāt sā tathā viśuddhā jāta,
SA11bsa047_u:559: yena sarvadharmaniḥsvabhāvatājñāne 'pi sakalasattvāpekṣā na vyāvartate yāvat saṃsāra eva ananuliptāḥ saṃsāradoṣairavatiṣṭhanta iti /
SA11bsa047_u:561: jñānaṃ nirātmakaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ nirābhāsena paśyati / iti /
SA11bsa047_u:562: yasmād yad advayalakṣaṇaṃ jñānam advayavādināṃ śreṣṭhaṃ paramārthenābhimataṃ tadapi nirātmakaṃ niḥsvabhāvam advayanirābhāsena jñānena paśyati yogī /
SA11bsa047_u:565: atredānīṃ ko 'sau yogī vidyate, yaḥ paśyatīti cet?
SA11bsa047_u:566: na paramārthataḥ kaścid ātmādiḥ svatantro 'sti, yogī nāpi kaścit paśyati /
SA11bsa047_u:567: kintu saṃvṛtyā yathā rūpādīviṣayākārajñānotpādamātreṇa vijñānameva loke tathā tathā vyavahriyate devadatto yajñadattaṃ jñānena paśyatīti na tu kaścid ātmādirasti /
SA11bsa047_u:568: tathātrāpi jñānamevādvayajñānanirābhāsam utpadyamānaṃ tathā vyapadiśyate nirābhāsena jñānena paśyatiti /
SA11bsa047_u:569: na hi sarvadharmāṇāṃ paramārthato niḥsvabhāvatve 'pi saṃvṛtyā yogijñānam anyad vā pṛthagjñānaṃ neṣṭam /
SA11bsa047_u:570: tathā coktam āryasatyadvayanirdeśe- "paramārthato 'tyantābhāvaśca saṃvṛttyā ca mārga bhāvayati" iti /
SA11bsa047_u:572: kintu yasya saṃvṛtyāpi kāraṇaṃ nāsti sa saṃvṛtyāpi notpadyate /
SA11bsa047_u:574: yasya tu [kāraṇaṃ] vidyate sa paramārthato 'līko 'pi samutpadyata eva /
SA11bsa047_u:576: na ca māyādeḥ saṃvṛtyā pratītyasamutpāde paramārthato vastutvaprasaṅgaḥ, tasya vicārākṣamatvāt /
SA11bsa047_u:578: tatra yathā kleśakarmamāyāvaśāt sattvānāṃ janmamāyā pravarteta,
SA11bsa047_u:579: tathā yogināmapi puṇyajñānasambhāramāyāvaśād yogijñānamāyā pravartata eva /
SA11bsa047_u:585: anena subhūte, paryāyeṇa sarvadharmā nirmitotpannāḥ" iti /
SA11bsa047_u:587: te hi māyākāravat tāṃ māyāṃ yathāvat parijñānāt satyato nābhiniviśante,
SA11bsa047_u:589: ye tāṃ bālapṛthagjanavat kautūhalaṃ styatvenābhiniviṣṭāste viparītābhiniveśad bāla ucyante iti sarvamaviruddham /
SA11bsa047_u:592: na cāsya nirmite saṅgo jñātapūrvo yato 'sya saḥ //
SA11bsa047_u:596: tatra ca layauddhatyādīn vyutthitān pūrvavat praśamayet /
SA11bsa047_u:597: yadā tu sarvadharmaniḥsvabhāvatālambane ca layauddhatyādirahitam anabhisaṃskāreṇa pravṛttaṃ jñānaṃ bhavati,
SA11bsa047_u:599: tathā yāvat śaknoti tāvad adhimuktibalena adhimukticaryābhūmau sthito bhāvayet /
SA11bsa047_u:600: tato yathecchaṃ paryaṅkamābhujya vyutthāya punarevaṃ cintayet /
SA11bsa047_u:601: yadi nāmāmī dharmāḥ paramārthata eva niḥsvabhāvā apyete saṃvṛtyā sthitā eva /
SA11bsa047_u:602: tathā coktam āryaratnameghe- "kathaṃ bodhisattvo nairātmyakuśalo bhavati?
SA11bsa047_u:606: sa rūpaṃ pratyavekṣamāṇo rūpasyotpādaṃ nopalabhate, virodhaṃ nopalabhate, samudayaṃ nopalabhate /
SA11bsa047_u:607: evaṃ vedanāyāḥ saṃjñāyāḥ saṃskārāṇāṃ vijñānasyotpādaṃ nopalabhate,
SA11bsa047_u:610: ayaṃ ca paramārthato 'nutpādavihāriṇyāḥ prajñāyā na punarvyāvahārikeṇa svabhāvena" iti vistaraḥ /
SA11bsa047_u:611: ete ca bālabuddhaya evaṃ niḥsvabhāveṣu bhāveṣu [Bhk_194] viparītābhiniveśāt saṃsāre paribhramanto vividhāni duḥkhāni pratyanubhavanti /
SA11bsa047_u:612: mahākaruṇām eva āmukhīkṛtya evamanuvicintayet- tathāhaṃ kariṣyāmi yathā sarvajñatvaṃ prāpya eteṣāṃ dharmatāmavabodhayeyamiti /
SA11bsa047_u:615: tathā coktam āryadharmasaṃgītau- "yathābhūtadarśino bodhisattvasya sattveṣu mahākaruṇā pravartate /
SA11bsa047_u:616: evaṃ cāsya bhavati- idaṃ mayā samādhimukhaṃ sarvadharmayathābhūtadarśaṃ ca sarvasattvānāṃ nispādayitavyam /
SA11bsa047_u:617: sa tayā mahākaruṇayā saṃcodyamāno 'dhiśīlam adhicittam adhiprajñaṃ ca śikṣātrayaṃ paripūryānuttaraṃ samyaksambodhim abhisambudhyate" iti /
SA11bsa047_u:618: ayameva prajñopāyayuganaddhabāhī bodhisattvānāṃ mārgo yat paramārthadarśane 'pi saṃvṛtiṃ nocchedayanti /
SA11bsa047_u:619: saṃvṛtiṃ cānucchedayanto mahākaruṇāpūrvaṅgamā aviparyastā eva sattvārthakriyāsu pravartante /
SA11bsa047_u:621: iha bodhisattvaḥ sarvāsu śikṣāsu śikṣate, śikṣāmārgaṃ ca nopalabhate /
SA11bsa047_u:624: na ca taddhetukaṃ tannidānaṃ tatpratyayam ucchedadṛṣṭau patati" iti /
SA11bsa047_u:633: sā mayā [Bhk_195] pratipattiḥ pratipattavyā sarvasattvānāṃ hitāvahā sukhāvahā /
SA11bsa047_u:634: tasya skandheṣu māyāvat pratyavekṣaṇā pratipattirna ca skandhaparityāgaṃ spṛhayatīti /
SA11bsa047_u:635: dhātuṣvāśīviṣavat pratyavekṣaṇā pratipattirna ca dhātuparityāgaṃ spṛhayatīti /
SA11bsa047_u:637: rūpasya phenapiṇḍavat pratyavekṣaṇā pratipattirna ca tathāgatarūpakāyaviṭhapanāṃ jahāti /
SA11bsa047_u:638: vedanāyā budbudvat pratyavekṣaṇā pratipattirna ca tathāgatadhyānasamādhisamāpattisukhaniṣpadanaprayogaṃ nārabhate /
SA11bsa047_u:639: saṃjñāyāṃ marīcivat pratyavekṣaṇā pratipattirna ca tathāgatajñānaniṣpādana apratipattiḥ /
SA11bsa047_u:640: saṃskārāṇāṃ kadalīvat pratyavekṣaṇā pratipattirna ca buddhadharmasaṃskārāṇām apratipattiḥ /
SA11bsa047_u:641: vijñānasya māyāvat pratyavekṣaṇā pratipattirna ca jñānapūrvaṅgamakāyavāṅmanaskarmaniṣpādanā pratipattiḥ" iti vistaraḥ /
SA11bsa047_u:643: tatra yadi nāma lokottaraprajñāvasthāyām upāyasevanā na sambhavati,
SA11bsa047_u:644: upāyasevanākāle tu bodhisattvasya māyākāravad aviparyastatvāt lokottarajñānāt prayogapṛṣṭhabhāvani yathāvad vastuparamārthatattvābhiniveśanī prajñāsambhavatyeveti,
SA11bsa047_u:647: evamanena krameṇa bodhisattvasya prajñām upāyaṃ ca satataṃ satkṛtya dīrghakālābhyāsena bhāvayato dvādaśāvasthāviśeṣā bhavanti /
SA11bsa047_u:650: tatra yāvat pudgaladharmanairātmyatvaṃ na sākṣātkaroti, kevalaṃ dṛḍhatarādhimuktiḥ /
SA11bsa047_u:653: asyāmapi bhūmau vartamāno bodhisattva pṛthagjano 'pi sarvabālavipattisamatikrānto 'saṃkhyeyasamādhidhāraṇīvimokṣābhijñādiguṇānvita āryaratnameghe paṭhyate /
SA11bsa047_u:654: asyā eva ca mṛdumadhyādhimātrādhimātratarāvasthācatuṣṭayena catvāri nirvedhabhāgīyāni vyavasthāpyante /
SA11bsa047_u:655: tathā hi yadā [bāhyārtha vibhāvayatā] īṣatspaṣṭo jñānāloko bhavati tadā uṣmagatanāmakaṃ nirvedhabhāgīyaṃ bhavati /
SA11bsa047_u:657: yadā tu sa eva jñānaloko madhyamaspaṣṭo bhavati,
SA11bsa047_u:664: yadā tu grāhyagrāhakākārarahitam advayaṃ jñānaṃ vibhāvayet tadāgradharmākhyaṃ nirvedhabhāgīyaṃ bhavati /
SA11bsa047_u:669: tathā hi yadāgradharmānantaraṃ prathamataraṃ lokottaraṃ sarvaprapañcarahitaṃ sarvadharmaniḥsvabhāvatāsākṣātkāri sphuṭataraṃ jñānam utpadyate,
SA11bsa047_u:670: tadā bodhisattvaḥ samyaktvanyayābhāvakrāntito darśanamārgotpādāt prathamāṃ bhūmiṃ praviṣṭo bhavati /
SA11bsa047_u:671: ata evāsyāṃ bhūmau prathamato 'nadhigatatattvādhigamād bodhisattvaḥ pramudito bhavati /
SA11bsa047_u:673: atra ca dvādaśottaraṃ darśanaheyaṃ kleśaśataṃ prahīyate /
SA11bsa047_u:677: asyāṃ ca bhūmau bodhisattvasya dharmadhātusamudāgamatāprabodhāt svārtha iva parāthe pravartanād dānapāramitātiriktatarā bhavati /
SA11bsa047_u:678: sa ca bodhisattvaḥ samadhigatatattvo 'pi vā yāvann śaknoti sūkṣmāpattiskhaliteṣu samprajanyavihāri bhavituṃ tāvat prathamā bhūmiḥ /
SA11bsa047_u:679: yadā tu śaknoti, tadāsyāṅgasya paripūrito dvitīyā bhūmirvyavasthāpyate /
SA11bsa047_u:680: ata evāsyāṃ bhūmau sūkṣmāpattiskhalitasamudācārāt śīlapāramitātiriktatarā bhavati /
SA11bsa047_u:683: yāvanna śaknoti sakalalaukikaṃ samādhiṃ samāpattuṃ yathāśrutaṃ cārtham ādharttuṃ tāvad dvitīyaiva bhūmiḥ /
SA11bsa047_u:684: yadā śaknoti, tadā tasyāṅgasya paripūritastṛtīyā bhūmirvyavasthāpyate /
SA11bsa047_u:685: asyāṃ ca bhūmau bodhisattvasya śrutadhāraṇyā sarvalaukikasamādhyābhinirhārārthaṃ sarvaduḥkhasahanāt,
SA11bsa047_u:687: teṣāṃ samādhīnāṃ lābhād iya bhūmirapramāṇaṃ lokottaraṃ jñānāvabhāsaṃ karotīti prabhākarītyucyate /
SA11bsa047_u:688: sa pratilabdhalaukikasakalasamādhirapi yāvann śaknoti yathāpratilabdhairbodhipakṣairdharmairbahulaṃ vihartuṃ sarvasamāpattīnāṃ ca cittam upekṣituṃ tāvat tṛtīyā bhūmiḥ /
SA11bsa047_u:689: yadā tu śaknoti tadā tasyāṅgasya paripūritaścaturthī bhūmirvyavasthāpyate /
SA11bsa047_u:692: iyaṃ ca sakalakleśendhanadāhasamarthasya bodhipakṣadharmārciṣa udgatatvād arciṣmatītyucyate /
SA11bsa047_u:694: yāvanna śaknoti satyāni bhāvayan saṃsārānabhimukhaṃ nirvāṇābhimukhaṃ ca ceto vyāvartayitum upāyasaṃgṛhītān [Bhk_198] bodhipakṣān dharmān bhāvayitum,
SA11bsa047_u:696: yadā tu śaknoti tadāsyāṅgasya paripūritaḥ pañcamī bhūmirvyavasthāpyate /
SA11bsa047_u:697: ata evāsyām iyam upāyasaṃgṛhītā bodhipakṣabhāvanā [paripūritena] suṣṭhu duḥkhena jīyate abhyasyatā iti sudurjayetyujyate /
SA11bsa047_u:700: yāvad na śaknoti saṃsārapravṛttipratyavekṣaṇān nirvitsahayā cittasantatyānimittavihāraṃ samāpattuṃ tāvat pañcamī bhūmiḥ /
SA11bsa047_u:701: yadā śaknoti tadāsyāṅgasya paripūritaḥ ṣaṣṭhī bhūmirvyavasthāpyate /
SA11bsa047_u:702: asyāṃ ca bodhisattvasya pratītyasamutpādabhāvanāvihārāt prajñāpāramitātiriktatarā bhavati /
SA11bsa047_u:703: ata eva prajñāpāramitāyā atiriktataratvāt sarvabuddhadharmeṣu abhimukho 'syāṃ bhūmau vartata iti kṛtvā abhimukhītyucyate /
SA11bsa047_u:705: yāvanna śaknoti niśchidram animittavihāraṃ samāpattum, tāvat ṣaṣṭhī bhūmiḥ /
SA11bsa047_u:706: yadā śaknoti tadāsyāṅgasya paripūritaḥ saptamī bhūmirvyavasthāpyate /
SA11bsa047_u:707: asyāmapi bhūmau bodhisattvaḥ sarvanimittaṃ nirnimittena pratividhyati nimittakṛtavyavahāraṃ ca na virodhayati /
SA11bsa047_u:709: iyaṃ ca bhūmiranābhogamārgopaśleṣāt suṣṭhu dūraṅgamād dūraṅgamā /
SA11bsa047_u:711: yāvanna śaknotyanābhogavāhinam animittavihāraṃ samāpattuṃ tāvat saptamī bhūmiḥ /
SA11bsa047_u:713: asyāṃ ca bhūmau anābhogena kuśalapakṣayogāt praṇidhānapāramitātiriktatarā bhavati /
SA11bsa047_u:717: yāvanna śaknoti paryāyaniruktyādiprabhedaiḥ sarvākārasarvadharmadeśanāyāṃ vaśībhavituṃ tāvad aṣṭamī bhūmiḥ /
SA11bsa047_u:718: yadā śaknoti tadāsyāṅgasya paripūrito navamī bhūmirvyavasthāpyate /
SA11bsa047_u:719: asyāṃ ca bhūmau bodhisattvasya pratisaṃvid- viśeṣalābhāt prajñābalaviśeṣayogād balapāramitātiriktatarā bhavati /
SA11bsa047_u:722: yāvanna śaknoti buddhakṣetraparṣannirmāṇādi darśayituṃ paripūrṇadharmasambhogaṃ sattvaparipākaṃ ca kartum,
SA11bsa047_u:724: yadā tu śaknoti tadāsyāṅgasya paripūrito daśamī bhūmirvyavasthāpyate /
SA11bsa047_u:725: asyāṃ ca nirmāṇādinā sattvaparipācanāya jñānaviśeṣayogād bodhisattvasya jñānapāramitātiriktatarā bhavati /
SA11bsa047_u:726: iyaṃ ca dharmadeśanāmeghaiḥ ananteṣu lokadhātuṣu dharmapravarṣaṇād dharmameghetyucyate /
SA11bsa047_u:729: sa pratilabdha- nirmāṇādivaśito 'pi yāvan na śaknoti sarvasmin jñeye sarvākāram asaktam /
SA11bsa047_u:730: apratihataṃ jñānam utpādayituṃ tāvad daśamī bhūmi /
SA11bsa047_u:733: asyāśca buddhabhūmeḥ sarvākārasakalasaṃpatprakarṣḍaparyantagamanānnāparam utkṛṣṭaṃ sthānāntaramasti [tasmāt tataḥ paraṃ nāsti bhūmivyavasthā] iti /
SA11bsa047_u:734: asyāśca buddhamūmerguṇapakṣaprabhedo buddhairapi na śakyate sarvākāraṃ vaktum /
SA11bsa047_u:742: aśeṣadoṣāpagamaniṣṭhāṃ prāpya bhagavān buddho dharmakāye sthitvā sambhoganirmāṇakāyābhyām anābhogarūpeṇa aśeṣajagadartha kurvan yāvat saṃsāraṃ viharati /
SA11bsa047_u:743: tasmāt prekṣavadbhiḥ sarvaguṇākareṣu bhagavatsu śraddhā utpadanīyā,
SA11bsa047_u:746: nayasyānusāreṇa sūtrasya cāṭha saduktyāsya mārgasya jinaputrakāṇām /
SA11bsa047_u:747: mayānalpapuṇyaṃ yadāptaṃ ca tena parāmetu buddhiṃ jaganmandamāśu //
SA11bsa047_u:748: bhūpatiśrīdevarājavacanena] kamalaśīlena bhāvanākramasya ayaṃ saṃkṣepaḥ kṛtaḥ /
SA11bsa047_u:754: iha atīśighraṃ sarvajñatāprāptukāmena prekṣāvatā tatprāpaka-hetu-pratyayebhyo 'bhiyogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ /
SA11bsa047_u:755: itthamiyaṃ sarvajñatā tu hetuṃ vinā bhavituṃ na yujyate,
SA11bsa047_u:757: nirapekṣabhāve tu kutrāpi pratigho na syād, yato hi sarve 'pi sarvajñā eva na bhavanti /
SA11bsa047_u:758: kiṃ tarhi kasyacit kadācit kiñcinmātraṃmūtatvāt sarvaṃ hi vastu hetusāpekṣameva /
SA11bsa047_u:773: tathāpi bhagavataivābhisaṃbuddhaya vineyajanebhyo yathoktaṃ tathaiva mayā bhagavadvacanenaiva kathyate /
SA11bsa047_u:774: bhagavāṃstan avocat- "guhyādhipate! tat sarvajñajñānaṃ karuṇāmūlaṃ bodhicittahetukam upāyaparyavasānam" iti /
SA11bsa047_u:775: tasmāt sarvajñatāmadhigantukāmaiḥ karuṇā-bodhicittopāyeṣu eteṣu triṣu śikṣitavyam /
SA11bsa047_u:776: karuṇayā preryamāṇā bodhisattvāḥ sarvasattvābhyuddhāraṇartham avaśyaṃ pratijñāsyanti /
SA11bsa047_u:778: tatra praviśya paripūrṇa puṇyajñānasambhāram avaśyaṃ sādhayati /
SA11bsa047_u:780: tarhi sarvajñatāmūlaṃ tu karuṇāyā eva bhūtatvāt sā tu prathamatarameva bhavanīyā /
SA11bsa047_u:781: āryadharmasaṃgītisūtre- "na bhagavan bodhisattvena atibahuṣu dharmeṣu śikṣitavyam /
SA11bsa047_u:782: eko dharmo bhagavan bodhisattvena svārādhitaḥ supratibiddhaḥ kartavyaḥ /
SA11bsa047_u:785: mahākaruṇāparigṛhītatvād bhagavanto buddhāḥ sakalasvārthasampattilābhe 'pi sattvadhātuparyavasānaparyantaṃ tiṣṭhanti /
SA11bsa047_u:787: sattvān avalokya tacchāntanirvāṇanagaraṃ prajvaladayogṛhavad dūraṃ tyaktatvād bhagavatām apratiṣṭhitanirvāṇahetustu sā mahākaruṇā eva /
SA11bsa047_u:789: saṃprati upekṣābhāvanayā sarvasattveṣu anurāgaṃ dveṣaṃ ca nirasya samācittatā prathamaṃ niṣpādayitavyā /
SA11bsa047_u:790: sarve sattvāḥ sukhaṃ kāmayante, duḥkhaṃ tu na kāmayante /
SA11bsa047_u:791: anādimati ca saṃsāre na kaścit sattvo yo nābhūt śataśo me bandhuriti paricintaya- taścātra ko viśeṣaḥ syāt?
SA11bsa047_u:792: tarhi kasmiṃścid anurāgaḥ kasmiṃścicca dveṣo bhavet,
SA11bsa047_u:793: tasmān mayā sarveṣu sattveṣu cittasamataiva kāryā iti /
SA11bsa047_u:794: evaṃ manasikāreṇa madhyasthapakṣata ārabhya mitre śatrau cacittasamatāmeva bhāvayet /
SA11bsa047_u:795: tataḥ sarvasattveṣu cittasamatāṃ sādhayitvā maitrīṃ bhāvayet /
SA11bsa047_u:796: maitrījalena cittasaṃtānaṃ siṃcayitvā vidyamānasuvarṇabhūmivat kṛtvā karuṇābījavapane sukhena atisuvistāro bhaviṣyati /
SA11bsa047_u:800: lokatrayasya sarvasattvānāṃ trividhaduḥkhatayā yathāyogam atyantaduḥkhitatvāt tadartha sarvasattveṣu sā bhāvanīyā /
SA11bsa047_u:801: tathā ca ye tāvannākārakāste vividhacirantanadīrghakālikadāhādi-dukheḥṣu nimagnā eva bhāvato varṇitāḥ /
SA11bsa047_u:802: tathā pretā api prāyo duḥsahatīvrakṣuttṛṣuduḥkhāgnyabhisaṃśoṣitamūrtayo bahuduḥkhamanubhavanti iti varṇitāḥ /
SA11bsa047_u:804: manuṣyā api kāmaparyeṣaṇākārpaṇyād anyo 'nyadrohopadhātakṛtaṃ priyaviprayogāpriyasaṃyogaṃ dāridrayādyutpannam aprameyaṃ duḥkhamanubhavanto dṛśyanto /
SA11bsa047_u:806: ye ca vividhakudṛṣṭigahananimagnāste sarve 'pi duḥkhahetutvāt prapatasthā iva atiduḥkhitā eva /
SA11bsa047_u:808: devā api ye kāmavacarāste 'pi nityacyavanapatanādibhayaśkopahatāḥ kathaṃ sukhitā nāma?
SA11bsa047_u:809: saṃskāradu khaṃ tu karmakleśalakṣaṇaṃ hetuparatantrasvabhāvaṃ pratikṣaṇabhaṅgurasvabhāvalakṣaṇaṃ ca sakalajagati vyāptam /
SA11bsa047_u:810: tasmāt sakalameva jagad duḥkhāgnijvālāntarapraviṣṭam avetya yathā mama duḥkham apriyam anyeṣāmapi tādṛśam iti cintayatā /

SA11bsa047_u:1384: yadi hi bhāvaḥ kadācid dṛṣṭo bhavet, tadā tasya pratiṣedhān nāstīti kalpayet /
SA11bsa047_u:1385: yadā kālatraye 'pi yoginā prajñayā nirūpayatā bhāvo nopalabdhaḥ tadā kasya pratiṣedhān nāstīti kalpayet /
SA11bsa047_u:1386: evamanye vikalpāstasya tadānīṃ na santi eva, bhāvābhāvavikalpābhyāṃ sarvasya vikalpasya vyāptatvāt /
SA11bsa047_u:1388: evaṃ sati niṣprapañcanirvikalpatāmavatīrṇo bhavati, rūpādiṣu cāniśrito bhavati /
SA11bsa047_u:1389: prajñayā ca nirūpayataḥ sakalavastusvabhāvānupalambhāt prajñottaradhyāyī bhavati /
SA11bsa047_u:1393: anabhisaṃskārataḥ tad eva tattvaṃ sphuṭataram avadhārayan yogī tiṣṭheta /
SA11bsa047_u:1395: yadāntarā cittaṃ bahirdhā vikṣiptaṃ paśyet tadā tatsvabhāvapratyevekṣaṇena vikṣepaṃ praśamayya,
SA11bsa047_u:1397: yadā tu tatrānabhirataṃ cittaṃ paśyet, tadā samādherguṇadarśanād abhiratiṃ tatra thāvayet /
SA11bsa047_u:1399: atha styānamiddhābhibhavād yada pracāratayā līnaṃ cittaṃ paśyet,
SA11bsa047_u:1400: layābhiśaṅkitaṃ vā tadā pramodyavastu buddharūpādikamālokasaṃjñāṃ vā manasikṛtya layamupaśamayet,
SA11bsa047_u:1402: yadā tu jātyandhavad andhakārapraviṣṭapuruṣavad vinimīlitākṣavat sphuṭataraṃ tattvaṃ nāvadhārayed yogī,
SA11bsa047_u:1403: tadā tasya līnaṃ cittaṃ veditavyaṃ vipaśyanārahitaṃ ca /
SA11bsa047_u:1404: atha yathā pūrvānubhūtaviṣayaspṛhayā cittamantarā samuddhataṃ paśyed,
SA11bsa047_u:1407: tataḥ punaḥ tatraiva tattve cittānabhisaṃskāravāhitāyāṃ yatnaṃ kurvīta /
SA11bsa047_u:1408: yadā ca vikṣiptapuruṣavad vānaravad vānavasthitavṛtti cittaṃ bhavet,
SA11bsa047_u:1410: atha yadā layauddhatyābhyāṃ viviktatayā samapravṛttaṃ svarasavāhi sphuṭataraṃ tatraiva tattve cittam utpādyate tadābhogaśithilīkaraṇād upekṣaṇiyam /
SA11bsa047_u:1412: yadā ca vipaśyanā bhāvayet prajñātiriktatarā bhāvayet,
SA11bsa047_u:1413: tadā śamathasyālpatvāt pravātasthitapradipavat pracalatvāccittasya na sphuṭataraṃ tattvadarśanaṃ bhavet /
SA11bsa047_u:1415: śamathasyābhyādhikye middhāvaṣṭabadhapuruṣasyeva sphuṭataraṃ tattvadarśanaṃ na syāt /
SA11bsa047_u:1417: yadā samapravṛtte dve api bhavato yuganaddhavāhibalīvardadvayavat tadānabhisaṃskāreṇaiva tāvat sthātavyaṃ yāvat kāyacittapīḍā na bhavet /
SA11bsa047_u:1418: saṃkṣepataḥ sarvasyaiva samādheḥ ṣaḍ doṣā bhavanti /
SA11bsa047_u:1419: kausīdyam, ālambanasaṃpramoṣaḥ, layaḥ, auddhatyam, anābhogaḥ, ābhogaśceti /
SA11bsa047_u:1421: śraddhā, chandaḥ, vyāyāmaḥ, prasrabdhiḥ, smṛtiḥ, saṃprajanyam, cetanā, upekṣā ceti /
SA11bsa047_u:1423: tathā hi- samādhiguṇeṣvabhisaṃpratyayalakṣaṇayā śraddhayā yogino 'bhilāṣaḥ samutpadyate /
SA11bsa047_u:1427: tataḥ [śraddhādayaḥ kausīdyaprahāṇāya bhavanti] tadartha te bhāvanīyāḥ /
SA11bsa047_u:1431: layauddhatyāpraśamanakāle tu anābhogadoṣaḥ tatastatpratipakṣeṇa cetanā bhāvanīyā /
SA11bsa047_u:1432: layauddhatyapraśame sati, yadā praśamabāhi cittaṃ bhavet, tadābhogadoṣaḥ /
SA11bsa047_u:1434: yadi samapravṛtte citte ābhogaḥ kriyate, tadā cittaṃ vikṣipyate /
SA11bsa047_u:1435: līne 'pi citte sati yadyābhogo na kriyate,
SA11bsa047_u:1438: tasmāt līnacittaṃ nigṛṇhīyād, uddhataṃ praśamayet, punaḥ samāprāptam upekṣeta /
SA11bsa047_u:1439: tato yāvadiccha yogī tāvad anabhisaṃskāreṇaiva tattvaṃ bhāvayaṃstiṣṭhet /
SA11bsa047_u:1440: satyāṃ tu kāyādipīḍāyāṃ punaḥ punarantarā sakalameva lokaṃ vyavalokyamāyājala candropamapratibhāsaṃ [vata] avataret /
SA11bsa047_u:1441: tatha coktam avikalpapraveśe- lokottareṇa jñānenākāśasamatalān sarvadharmānpaśyati /
SA11bsa047_u:1443: tad evaṃ māyopamaṃ jagad avagamya, sattveṣu mahākaruṇām āmukhīkṛtyaivam anuvicintayet /
SA11bsa047_u:1444: evaṃvidhaṃ dharmagāmbhoryam anavagacchanto 'mī bālabuddhaya ādiśānteṣveva dharmeṣu bhāvādisamāropaviparyastā vividhakarmakleśān upacinvanti /
SA11bsa047_u:1446: tato 'haṃ kariṣyāmi yathaitān evaṃvidhaṃ dharmāgāmbhīryam avabodhayeyam iti,
SA11bsa047_u:1447: tato viśramya punarapi tathaiva sarvadharmanirābhāsaṃ samādhimavataret /
SA11bsa047_u:1449: evam anena krameṇa ghaṭikām [arthapraharam] ekapraharaṃ vā yāvantaṃ kālaṃ śaknoti tāvantaṃ kālaṃ tiṣṭhet /
SA11bsa047_u:1451: tata icchayā samādheḥ utthātuṃ paryaṅkam abhittvaivam anuvicintayet /
SA11bsa047_u:1452: yadi nāmāmī dharmāḥ sarva eva paramārthato 'nutpannāstathāpi māyavat pratiniyatavividhahetupratyayasāmagrīvaśena vicitrā evāvicāraramaṇīyāḥ pravartante,
SA11bsa047_u:1457: tatra ye prajñācakṣurvikalatayā viparyastamatayā ātmābhiniviṣṭā vividhāni karmāṇi kurvanti te saṃsāre paribhramanti /
SA11bsa047_u:1458_0: ye punarekāntena saṃsāravimukhā mahākāruṇyavikalatayā ca na [sattvārthaṃ] dānādipāramitāḥ
SA11bsa047_u:1458_1: paripūrayanti ātmānaṃ damayanti te sattvā upāyavikalatayā śrāvakapratyekabuddhabodhau patanti /
SA11bsa047_u:1459_0: ye tu asvabhāvaṃ jagad avagamya mahākāruṇyabalena sakalajagadabhyuddharaṇakṛtaniścayā
SA11bsa047_u:1459_1: māyākāravad aviparyastadhiyo vipulapuṇyajñānasaṃbhāraṃ samupāyanti te tathāgataṃ
SA11bsa047_u:1459_2: padaṃ prāpyāsaṃsāramaśeṣasya jagataḥ sarvākāraṃ hitasukhāni saṃpādayantaḥ tiṣṭhanti /
SA11bsa047_u:1460: te ca jñāna[sambhāra]balena [samasta]kleśaprahāṇān na saṃsāre patanti sarvasattvāpekṣayā ca samupārjitavipulāprameyapuṇyasaṃbhāravaśena na nirvāṇe patanti,
SA11bsa047_u:1465: tasmāt tarhi bhagavan bodhisattvena mahāsattvena puṇyasambhāre jñānasaṃbhāre ca sarvadābhiyogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ" iti /
SA11bsa047_u:1466: āryatathāgatotpattisaṃbhasūtre coktam- "sa khalu punareṣa tathāgatānāṃ [Bhk_232] saṃbhavo naikena kāraṇena bhavati /
SA11bsa047_u:1470: āryavimalakīrtinirdeśe coktam- "śatapuṇyanirjātāḥ sarvakuśaladharmanirjātā apramāṇakuśalamūlakarmanirjātāḥ kāyāstathāgatasyeti" vistaraḥ /
SA11bsa047_u:1471: tad evaṃ kṛtvā śanaiḥ paryaṅkaṃ bhittvā daśadigvyavasthitān sarvabuddhabodhisattvān praṇipatya tebhyaśca pūjāstotropahāraṃ kṛtvāryabhadracaryādipraṇidhānaṃ pranidadhīta /
SA11bsa047_u:1475: ye punarna kiñciccintayanti nāpi kiñcit karma kurvanti te parimucyante saṃsārāt /
SA11bsa047_u:1480: mahāyānamūlatvācca sarvayānānāṃ tatpratikṣepeṇa sarvam eva yānaṃ pratikṣiptaṃ syāt /
SA11bsa047_u:1481: tathā hi 'na kiñciccintayitavyamiti' bruvata bhutapratyavekṣālakṣaṇā prajñā pratikṣiptā bhavet /
SA11bsa047_u:1482: bhūtapratyavekṣā-mūlatvāt samyagjñānasya tatpratikṣepā llokottarāpi prajñā pratikṣiptā bhavet /
SA11bsa047_u:1484: nāpi dānādicaryā kartavyeti vadatā copāyo dānādiḥ sphuṭatarameva pratikṣiptaḥ /
SA11bsa047_u:1485: etāvad eva ca saṃkṣiptaṃ mahāyānaṃ yaduta prajñopāyaśca /
SA11bsa047_u:1488: " āryatathāgataguhyasūtre coktam- "imau ca prajñopāyau bodhisattvānāṃ sarvapāramitāsaṃgrahāya saṃvartete" iti /
SA11bsa047_u:1489: tataśca mahāyānaṃ pratikṣipatā mahat karmāvaraṇaṃ kṛtaṃ syāt /
SA11bsa047_u:1493: ] asyānupāsitavidvajjanasyānavadhārita-tathāgata-pravacananīteḥ svayaṃ vinaṣṭasya parān api nāśayato yuktyāgamadūṣitatvāt,
SA11bsa047_u:1494: viṣasaṃsṛṣṭavacanaṃ saviṣabhojanamiva ātmakāmena dhīmatā dūrata eva parihartavyam /
SA11bsa047_u:1495: tathā hyanena bhūtapratyavekṣāṃ pratikṣipatā dharmapravicayākhyaṃ pradhānam eva bodhyaṅgaṃ pratikṣiptaṃ syāt /
SA11bsa047_u:1496: vinā ca mūtapratyavekṣayā yoginaḥ katham anādikālābhyastarūpādibhāvābhiniveśasya cittaṃ nirvikalpatāṃ praviśet?
SA11bsa047_u:1498: na hi vinā bhūtapratyavekṣayānubhūyamāneṣvapi sarvadharmeṣvasmṛtiramanasikāro vā śakyate kartum /
SA11bsa047_u:1499: yadi ca nāmāmī dharmā mayāsmartavyā nāpi manasikartavyā ityevaṃ bhāvayannasmṛtimanasikārau teṣu bhāvayet tadā sutarām eva tena te smṛtā manasikṛtāśca syuḥ /
SA11bsa047_u:1501: tadā tayorabhāvaḥ kena prakāreṇa bhavatīti etad eva vicāryate /
SA11bsa047_u:1502: na cābhāvaḥ kāraṇaṃ yuktam, yena tato [nirnimittāmanasikārāt] nirvikalpatā bhavet /
SA11bsa047_u:1504: na ca bhūtapratyavekṣāṃ vinānya upāyo 'sti yena prakāreṇāsmṛtyamanasikārau kuryāt /
SA11bsa047_u:1506: vinā bhūtapratyavekṣayā niḥsvabhāvatā dharmāṇāṃ katham avagatā bhavet?
SA11bsa047_u:1507: na hi svabhāvata evaṃ dharmāḥ [Bhk_234] śūnyāḥ sthitā ityevaṃ vinā tatpratyavekṣayā tacchūnyatāprativedho bhavet /
SA11bsa047_u:1508: nāpi vinā śūnyatāprativedhena āvaraṇaprahāṇaṃ saṃbhavati sarvatra sarveṣāṃ muktiprasaṅgāt /
SA11bsa047_u:1509: kiṃ ca tasya yogino yadi sarvadharmeṣu muṣitasmṛtitayā mūḍhatayā vā smṛtimanasikārau na pravartete,
SA11bsa047_u:1511: vinā ca bhūtapratyavekṣayā tatrāsmṛtim amanasikāraṃ cābhyastatā moha evābhyasto bhavet /
SA11bsa047_u:1514: tadā kathaṃ tatrāsmaraṇam amanasikāraṃ kartu śaknuyād vinā bhūtapratyavekṣayā /
SA11bsa047_u:1515: na hi smaranneva na smarati, paśyan eva na paśyatīti yuktam abhidhātum /
SA11bsa047_u:1518: na hyuṣṇaviruddhaṃ śītam āsevamānasya uṣṇasparśasaṃvedanaṃ bhavet /
SA11bsa047_u:1519: kiṃ ca samādhisamāpannasya yogino yadi manovijñānam asti, tadāvaśyaṃ tena kiṃcid ālambayitavyam /
SA11bsa047_u:1520: na hi pṛthagjanānāṃ sahasā nirālambanaṃ jñānaṃ bhavet /
SA11bsa047_u:1521: atha nāsti, tadā kathaṃ niḥsvabhāvatā dharmāṇāmavagatā bhavet?
SA11bsa047_u:1523: na ca caturthadhyānālābhinaḥ pṛthagjanasya cittanirodhaḥ saṃbhavati /
SA11bsa047_u:1524: tasmāt saddharme yāvasmṛtyamanasikārau paṭhitau tau bhūtapratyavekṣāpūrvākau draṣṭavyau /
SA11bsa047_u:1526: tathā hi yadā nirūpayan samyakprajñayā yogī kālatraye paramārthataḥ samutpannaṃ na kaṃcid dharma paśyati,
SA11bsa047_u:1528: yo hi kālatraye 'pyasattvān nānubhūtaḥ paramārthataḥ sa kathaṃ smaryeta, manasi vā kriyeta /
SA11bsa047_u:1529: tato 'sau sarvaprapañcopaśamaṃ nirvikalpaṃ jñānaṃ praviṣṭo bhavet /
SA11bsa047_u:1530: tatpraveśācca śūnyatāṃ pratividhyati tatprativedhācca prahīṇasakalakudṛṣṭijālo bhavati /
SA11bsa047_u:1534: tasmānna vinā bhūtapratyavekṣayā samyagjñānodayo nāpi kleśāvaraṇaprahāṇām /
SA11bsa047_u:1535: tathā coktaṃ mañjuśrīvikurvitasūtre- "kathaṃ dārike bodhisattvo vijitasaṃgrāmo bhavati?
SA11bsa047_u:1536: āha, yo mañjuśrīḥ vicāya vicāya sarvadharmān nopalabhate" iti /
SA11bsa047_u:1541: nairātmyadharmān yadi pratyevekṣate tān pratyavekṣya yadi bhāvayet /
SA11bsa047_u:1542: sa hetu nirvāṇapahalasya prāptaye yo 'nyaheturna sa bhoti śāntaye // iti /
SA11bsa047_u:1543: sutrasamuccaye coktam- "ātmanā vipaśyanāyogam anuyukto viharati parāṃśca vipaśyanāyāṃ nābhiyojayatīti mārakarmeti /
SA11bsa047_u:1545: āryaratnameghe ca- "vipaśyanāṃ nirūpayato niḥsvabhāvatāprativedhad animittapraveśa uktaḥ /
SA11bsa047_u:1550: tatra tatra sūtre yā bhagavatā nānāprakārā pratyavekṣā nirdiṣṭā sā virudhyate,
SA11bsa047_u:1552: tasmād evaṃ yuktaṃ vaktuṃ vayam alpaprajñā alpavīryāścana śaknumo bāhuśrutyaṃ paryeṣitumiti /
SA11bsa047_u:1553: na hi tatpratikṣepo yukto bhagavatā [Bhk_236] bahudhā bāhuśrutyasya varṇitatvāt /
SA11bsa047_u:1554: tat punarbrahmaparipṛcchāyām uktam- "ye tvacintyeṣu dharmeṣu [cintana]viprayuktāḥ teṣām ayoniśa iti /
SA11bsa047_u:1555: tatrāpi ye paramārthato 'nutpannānāṃ dharmāṇām utpādaṃ parikalpyānityaduḥkhadirūpeṇa śrāvakādivaccintāṃ prakurvanti,
SA11bsa047_u:1556: teṣāṃ samāropāpavādāntena cintāṃ pravartayatām ayoniśaḥ tad bhavatīti tatpratiṣedhāya yad uktaṃ na bhūtapratyavekṣāyāḥ sa pratiṣedhaḥ tasyāḥ sarvasūtreṣvanujñānāt /
SA11bsa047_u:1557: tathā ca tatraiva brahmaparipṛcchāyām uktam- "cittaśūro bodhisattva āha-yaścittena sarvadharmāścintayati tatra cākṣato 'nupahataḥ sa tenocyate bodhisattvaḥ" iti /
SA11bsa047_u:1558: tatraivoktam- "kathaṃ vīryavanto bhavanti, yada sarvajñatācittaṃ vicīyamānānopalabhante" iti /
SA11bsa047_u:1559: punaḥ tatraivoktam- "matimantaśca te bhaviṣyanti yoniśo dharmān pratyavekṣaṇatayeti" /
SA11bsa047_u:1560: punaḥ tatraivoktam- "pravicinvanti te dharmān yathā māyāmarīciketi" /
SA11bsa047_u:1562: tatra tatra śrutacintāmātreṇaiva tattvādhigamaṃ ye manyante,
SA11bsa047_u:1564: ayoniśaśca cittapratiṣedhaḥ kriyata iti boddhavyam, na bhūtapratyavekṣāyāḥ pratiṣedhaḥ /
SA11bsa047_u:1567: kiñca yad eva śrutacintāmayyā prajñayā viditaṃ tad eva bhāvanāmayyā prajñayā bhāvanīyaṃ nānyat /
SA11bsa047_u:1570: yadi nāmāsau vikalpasvabhāvātathāpi yoniśo manasikārasvabhāvatvāt tato bhūta nirvikalpajñānodaya iti kṛtvā tajjñānārthinā sā sevanīyā /
SA11bsa047_u:1573: kāṣṭhadvayanigharṣasaṃjātavanhinā tatkāṣṭhadvayadāhavat sāpi paścāt tenaiva dahyata evetyuktam āryaratnakūṭe /
SA11bsa047_u:1574: yaccāpyucyate- na kiṃcit kuśalādikarma kartavyam iti /
SA11bsa047_u:1575: tatraivaivaṃ vadatā karmakṣayān muktirityājīvaka vādābhyupagamo bhavet /
SA11bsa047_u:1578: anādikālopacittasya hi karmaṇo na śakyate kṣayaḥ kartu tasyānantatvāt /
SA11bsa047_u:1579: apāyādiṣu ca tatphalaṃ bhuñjānasyāparasyāpi karmaṇaḥ prasūteḥ kleśeṣu cāvikaleṣu tatkaraṇatayā sthiteṣu karmaṇo niroddhum aśakyatvāt /
SA11bsa047_u:1581: na cāpi tasya vipaśyanāpavādinaḥ kleśakṣayaḥ saṃbhavatītyukta prāk /
SA11bsa047_u:1583: tadā kleśakṣayād eva muktiḥ sidhyatīti karmakṣaye tarhi vyarthaḥ śramaḥ /
SA11bsa047_u:1584: akuśalakarma na kartavyam iti yuktametat, kuśalaṃ tu kimiti pratiṣidhyate /
SA11bsa047_u:1586: yad eva ātmādiviparyāsasamutthāpitam kuśalaṃ tad eva saṃsārāvāhakaṃ bhavati /
SA11bsa047_u:1588: tathā āryadaśabhūmake eta eva daśakuśalakarmapathāḥ pariṇāmanādipariśuddhiviśeṣeṇa śrāvakapratyekabuddhabodhisattvabuddhatvavāhakā bhavantīti nirdiṣṭam /
SA11bsa047_u:1590: sarvamahānadīnāṃ mahāsamudre praviṣṭānāṃ payaḥ skandhavad bodhisattvānāṃ nānāmukhopacitaṃ kuśalamūlaṃ sarvajñatāpariṇāmitaṃ sarvajñataikarasaṃ bhavati iti varṇitam /
SA11bsa047_u:1592: yā ca buddhabodhisattvānāṃ rūpakāyakṣetrapariśuddhiḥ prabhāparivāramahābhogatādisaṃpattiḥ dānādipuṇyasambhāraphalasattvena tatra tatra sūtre varṇitā bhagavatā sāpi virudhyate /
SA11bsa047_u:1595: kuśalakarmābhisaṃskāravaimukhye ca sati saṃsāravaimukhyaṃ sattvārthakriyāvaimukhyaṃ ca sevitaṃ bhavet /
SA11bsa047_u:1597: uktaṃ hyāryaṃsaṃdhinirmocane- "ekāntasattvārthavimukhasya ekāntasaṃskārā bhisaṃskāravimukhasya nānuttarāsamyaksaṃbodhiruktā mayeti /
SA11bsa047_u:1600: " uktam āryavimalakīrtinirdeśe ca- "upāyād bhavati saṃsāragamanaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mokṣaḥ /
SA11bsa047_u:1601: upāyarahitā ca prajñā bandhaḥ, prajñārahitaścopāyo bandhaḥ /
SA11bsa047_u:1602: prajñāsahita upāyo mokṣaḥ, upāyasahitā prajñā mokṣaḥ" iti varṇitam /
